pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, October 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, October 21, 2017:

Edmonton, Alberta

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with community leaders from the Edmonton Mennonite Centre for Newcomers.

Edmonton Mennonite Centre for Newcomers
11713 82nd Street NW

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity 
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Edmonton Police Service Downtown Division.

Edmonton Police Service Downtown Division

Note for media:

  • Closed to media

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Edmonton Room, Mezzanine Level
Fairmont Hotel MacDonald
10065 100 Street NW

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
